title: OLAP Querying of Document Stores in the Presence of Schema Variety
abstract: . Document stores are preferred to relational ones for storing heterogeneous data due to their schemaless nature. However, the absence of a unique schema adds complexity to analytical applications. In a previous paper we have proposed an original approach to OLAP on document stores; its basic idea was to stop ﬁghting against schema variety and welcome it as an inherent source of information wealth in schemaless sources.
